package.name: Knox Makers FreeCAD Manager
package.description: This addon provides a centralized way to manage themes, preferences, UI settings, and startup behavior across all FreeCAD installations at Knox Makers. It includes support for CNC machines at Knox Makers with up-to-date tool libraries, job templates, and custom post processors. Designed to keep laptops, shop machines, and individual users in sync, it ensures a shared and streamlined FreeCAD experience throughout the makerspace.
